div.h4: DeSmet Public School transforms lives through teaching, inspiring, and nurturing.

DeSmet Public School families and communities nurture the social-emotional, physical and academic development of each child. We honor diversity and inspire students to become resilient, life-long learners and caring stewards of our ever changing world.
